00029 class Rates : public PairCalculator2
00030 {
00031 public:
00032 
00033     Rates() { };
00034    ~Rates() { };
00035 
00036     string Identify() { return "Rates"; }
00037 
00038     void Initialize(Topology *top, Property *options);
00039     void ParseEnergiesXML(Topology *top, Property *opt);
00040     void EvaluatePair(Topology *top, QMPair *pair);
00041     void CalculateRate(Topology *top, QMPair *pair, int state);
00042 
00043 
00044 private:
00045 
00046     map<string, double> _seg_U_cC_nN_e;
00047     map<string, double> _seg_U_nC_nN_e;
00048     map<string, double> _seg_U_cN_cC_e;
00049 
00050     map<string, double> _seg_U_cC_nN_h;
00051     map<string, double> _seg_U_nC_nN_h;
00052     map<string, double> _seg_U_cN_cC_h;
00053 
00054     map<string, bool>   _seg_has_e;
00055     map<string, bool>   _seg_has_h;
00056 
00057 
00058     string _rateType;
00059     vec    _F;
00060     double _kT;
00061     double _omegaVib;
00062     int    _nMaxVib;
00063

00065

00071 void Rates::Initialize(Topology *top, Property *options) {
00072 
00073     string key = "options.rates";
00074 
00075     /* ---- OPTIONS.XML Structure -----
00076      *
00077      * <rates>
00078      *
00079      *      <temperature></temperature>
00080      *      <field></field>
00081      *
00082      *      <method></method>
00083      *      <nmaxvib></nmaxvib>
00084      *      <omegavib></omegavib>
00085      *
00086      * </rates>
00087      *
00088      */
00089 
00090     // Control parameters
00091     double T = options->get(key+".temperature").as<double> ();
00092     _kT = 8.6173324e-5 * T;
00093 
00094     vec F = options->get(key+".field").as<vec>();
00095     _F = F;
00096 
00097 
00098     // Method
00099     if (options->exists(key+".method")) {
00100         _rateType = options->get(key+".method").as<string> ();
00101     }
00102     else {
00103         cout << endl 
00104              << "... ... ERROR: No method to calculate rates specified. "
00105              << endl;
00106         throw std::runtime_error("Missing input in options file.");
00107     }
00108     if (_rateType != "marcus" && _rateType != "jortner") {
00109         cout << endl
00110              << "... ... ERROR: Unknown rate type '" << _rateType << "' "
00111              << endl;
00112         throw std::runtime_error("Faulty input in options file.");
00113     }
00114 
00115 
00116     // Vibrational quanta
00117     if (options->exists(key+".nmaxvib")) {
00118         _nMaxVib = options->get(key+".nmaxvib").as<double> ();
00119     }
00120     else {
00121         _nMaxVib = 20;
00122         cout << endl << "... ... WARNING: No cut-off number for QM vibrations "
00123                         "provided, using default 20.";
00124     }
00125     if (options->exists(key+".omegavib")) {
00126         _omegaVib = options->get(key+".omegavib").as<double> ();
00127     }
00128     else {
00129         _omegaVib = 0.2;
00130         cout << endl << "... ... WARNING: No QM vibration frequency provided, "
00131                         "using default 0.2eV.";
00132     }
00133 
00134 
00135     // this->ParseEnergiesXML(top, options);
00136 
00137 }
00138 
00139 
00140 void Rates::ParseEnergiesXML(Topology *top, Property *opt) {
00141 
00142     string key = "options.rates";
00143     string energiesXML = opt->get(key+".energiesXML").as<string> ();
00144 
00145     cout << endl
00146          << "... ... Site, reorg. energies from " << energiesXML << ". "
00147          << flush;
00148 
00149     Property alloc;
00150     load_property_from_xml(alloc, energiesXML.c_str());
00151 
00152     /* --- ENERGIES.XML Structure ---
00153      *
00154      * <topology>
00155      *
00156      *     <molecules>
00157      *          <molecule>
00158      *          <name></name>
00159      *
00160      *          <segments>
00161      *
00162      *              <segment>
00163      *              <name></name>
00164      *
00165      *              <!-- U_sG_sG, s->state, G->geometry !-->
00166      *
00167      *              <U_cC_nN_e></U_cC_nN_e>
00168      *              <U_cC_nN_h></U_cC_nN_h>
00169      *
00170      *              <U_nC_nN_e></U_nC_nN_e>
00171      *              <U_nC_nN_h></U_nC_nN_h>
00172      *
00173      *              <U_cN_cC_e></U_cN_cC_e>
00174      *              <U_cN_cC_h></U_cN_cC_h>
00175      *
00176      *              </segment>
00177      *
00178      *              <segment>
00179      *                  ...
00180      *
00181      */
00182 
00183     key = "topology.molecules.molecule";
00184     list<Property*> mols = alloc.Select(key);
00185     list<Property*> ::iterator molit;
00186     for (molit = mols.begin(); molit != mols.end(); ++molit) {
00187 
00188         key = "segments.segment";
00189         list<Property*> segs = (*molit)->Select(key);
00190         list<Property*> ::iterator segit;
00191 
00192         for (segit = segs.begin(); segit != segs.end(); ++segit) {
00193 
00194             string segName = (*segit)->get("name").as<string> ();
00195 
00196             bool has_e = false;
00197             bool has_h = false;
00198 
00199             double U_cC_nN_e = 0.0;
00200             double U_cC_nN_h = 0.0;
00201             double U_nC_nN_e = 0.0;
00202             double U_nC_nN_h = 0.0;
00203             double U_cN_cC_e = 0.0;
00204             double U_cN_cC_h = 0.0;
00205 
00206             if ( (*segit)->exists("U_cC_nN_e") &&
00207                  (*segit)->exists("U_nC_nN_e") &&
00208                  (*segit)->exists("U_cN_cC_e")    ) {
00209 
00210                 U_cC_nN_e = (*segit)->get("U_cC_nN_e").as< double > ();
00211                 U_nC_nN_e = (*segit)->get("U_nC_nN_e").as< double > ();
00212                 U_cN_cC_e = (*segit)->get("U_cN_cC_e").as< double > ();
00213 
00214                 has_e = true;
00215             }
00216             
00217             if ( (*segit)->exists("U_cC_nN_h") &&
00218                  (*segit)->exists("U_nC_nN_h") &&
00219                  (*segit)->exists("U_cN_cC_h")    ) {
00220 
00221                 U_cC_nN_h = (*segit)->get("U_cC_nN_h").as< double > ();
00222                 U_nC_nN_h = (*segit)->get("U_nC_nN_h").as< double > ();
00223                 U_cN_cC_h = (*segit)->get("U_cN_cC_h").as< double > ();
00224 
00225                 has_h = true;
00226             }
00227 
00228             _seg_U_cC_nN_e[segName] = U_cC_nN_e;
00229             _seg_U_nC_nN_e[segName] = U_nC_nN_e;
00230             _seg_U_cN_cC_e[segName] = U_cN_cC_e;
00231             _seg_has_e[segName] = has_e;
00232 
00233             _seg_U_cC_nN_h[segName] = U_cC_nN_h;
00234             _seg_U_nC_nN_h[segName] = U_nC_nN_h;
00235             _seg_U_cN_cC_h[segName] = U_cN_cC_h;
00236             _seg_has_h[segName] = has_h;
00237         }
00238     }
00239 }

00242 void Rates::EvaluatePair(Topology *top, QMPair *qmpair) {
00243 
00244     cout << "\r... ... Evaluating pair " << qmpair->getId()+1 << ". " << flush;
00245 
00246     bool pair_has_e = false;
00247     bool pair_has_h = false;
00248 
00249     string segName1 = qmpair->first->getName();
00250     string segName2 = qmpair->second->getName();
00251 
00252     pair_has_e = qmpair->isPathCarrier(-1);
00253     pair_has_h = qmpair->isPathCarrier(+1);
00254 
00255 //    try {
00256 //        pair_has_e = _seg_has_e.at(segName1) && _seg_has_e.at(segName2);
00257 //        pair_has_h = _seg_has_h.at(segName1) && _seg_has_h.at(segName2);
00258 //    }
00259 //    catch (out_of_range) {
00260 //        cout << endl << "... ... WARNING: No energy information for pair ["
00261 //                     << segName1 << ", " << segName2 << "]. "
00262 //                     << "Skipping... " << endl;
00263 //
00264 //        return;
00265 //    }
00266 
00267     if (pair_has_e) {
00268         this->CalculateRate(top, qmpair, -1);
00269     }
00270     if (pair_has_h) {
00271         this->CalculateRate(top, qmpair, +1);
00272     }
00273 }
00274 
00275 
00276 void Rates::CalculateRate(Topology *top, QMPair *qmpair, int state) {
00277 
00278     const double NM2M    = 1.e-9;
00279     const double hbar_eV = 6.58211899e-16;
00280 
00281     Segment *seg1 = qmpair->first;
00282     Segment *seg2 = qmpair->second;
00283 
00284     double rate12 = 0.;                                       // 1->2
00285 
00286     double rate21 = 0.;                                       // 2->1
00287 
00288     double reorg12  = seg1->getU_nC_nN(state)                 // 1->2
00289                     + seg2->getU_cN_cC(state);
00290     double reorg21  = seg1->getU_cN_cC(state)                 // 2->1
00291                     + seg2->getU_nC_nN(state);
00292     double lOut     = qmpair->getLambdaO(state);              // 1->2 == + 2->1
00293 
00294     double dG_Site  = seg2->getU_cC_nN(state)                 // 1->2 == - 2->1
00295                     + seg2->getEMpoles(state)
00296                     - seg1->getU_cC_nN(state)
00297                     - seg1->getEMpoles(state);
00298     double dG_Field = - state * _F * qmpair->R() * NM2M;      // 1->2 == - 2->1
00299 
00300     double J2 = qmpair->getJeff2(state);                      // 1->2 == + 2->1
00301 
00302     /*
00303     if (state == -1) {
00304 
00305         // Charge hops Seg1 -> Seg2
00306         reorg12 = _seg_U_nC_nN_e[seg1->getName()]
00307                 + _seg_U_cN_cC_e[seg2->getName()];
00308 
00309         // Charge hops Seg2 -> Seg1
00310         reorg21 = _seg_U_nC_nN_e[seg2->getName()]
00311                 + _seg_U_cN_cC_e[seg1->getName()];
00312 
00313         // dG Seg1 -> Seg2
00314         dG_Site = _seg_U_cC_nN_e[seg2->getName()] + seg2->getEMpoles(state)
00315                 - _seg_U_cC_nN_e[seg1->getName()] - seg1->getEMpoles(state);
00316     }
00317 
00318     else if (state == +1) {
00319 
00320         // Charge hops Seg1 -> Seg2
00321         reorg12 = _seg_U_nC_nN_h[seg1->getName()]
00322                 + _seg_U_cN_cC_h[seg2->getName()];
00323 
00324         // Charge hops Seg2 -> Seg1
00325         reorg21 = _seg_U_nC_nN_h[seg2->getName()]
00326                 + _seg_U_cN_cC_h[seg1->getName()];
00327 
00328         // dG Seg1 -> Seg2
00329         dG_Site = _seg_U_cC_nN_h[seg2->getName()] + seg2->getEMpoles(state)
00330                 - _seg_U_cC_nN_h[seg1->getName()] - seg1->getEMpoles(state);
00331     }
00332     */
00333 
00334     double dG = dG_Field + dG_Site;
00335 
00336     // +++++++++++++ //
00337     // JORTNER RATES //
00338     // +++++++++++++ //
00339 
00340     if (_rateType == "jortner" && lOut < 0.) {
00341         cout << endl
00342              << "... ... ERROR: Pair " << qmpair->getId() << " has negative "
00343                 "outer-sphere reorganization energy. Cannot calculate Jortner "
00344                 "rates. "
00345              << endl;
00346         throw std::runtime_error("");
00347     }
00348     else if (_rateType == "jortner" && lOut < 0.01) {
00349         cout << endl
00350              << "... ... WARNING: Pair " << qmpair->getId() << " has small "
00351                 "outer-sphere reorganization energy (" << lOut << "eV). Could "
00352                 "lead to over-estimated Jortner rates."
00353              << endl;
00354     }
00355 
00356     if (_rateType == "jortner") {
00357 
00358         double huang_rhys12 = reorg12 / _omegaVib;
00359         double huang_rhys21 = reorg21 / _omegaVib;
00360 
00361         int nvib;
00362         for (nvib = 0; nvib <= _nMaxVib; nvib++) {
00363 
00364             // Hopping from Seg1 -> Seg2
00365             rate12 += 1 / hbar_eV * sqrt( M_PI / (lOut*_kT) )
00366                     * J2 * exp(-huang_rhys12) * pow(huang_rhys12, nvib) /
00367                            Factorial(nvib)
00368                     * exp( -pow( (dG + nvib*_omegaVib + lOut) , 2 ) /
00369                            (4*_kT*lOut) );
00370 
00371             // Hopping from Seg2 -> Seg1
00372             rate21 += 1 / hbar_eV * sqrt( M_PI / (lOut*_kT) )
00373                     * J2 * exp(-huang_rhys21) * pow(huang_rhys21, nvib) /
00374                            Factorial(nvib)
00375                     * exp( -pow( (-dG + nvib*_omegaVib + lOut) , 2 ) /
00376                            (4*_kT*lOut) );
00377         }
00378     }
00379 
00380     // ++++++++++++ //
00381     // MARCUS RATES //
00382     // ++++++++++++ //
00383 
00384     else if (_rateType == "marcus") {
00385 
00386         reorg12 = reorg12 + lOut;
00387         reorg21 = reorg21 + lOut;
00388 
00389         rate12 = J2 / hbar_eV * sqrt( M_PI / (reorg12*_kT) )
00390                 * exp( - (+dG - reorg12)*(+dG - reorg12) / (4*_kT*reorg12) );
00391 
00392         rate21 = J2 / hbar_eV * sqrt( M_PI / (reorg21*_kT) )
00393                 * exp( - (-dG - reorg21)*(-dG - reorg21) / (4*_kT*reorg21) );
00394     }
00395 
00396     qmpair->setRate12(rate12, state);
00397     qmpair->setRate21(rate21, state);
00398     qmpair->setIsPathCarrier(true, state);
00399 
00400 }
00401 
00402 int Rates::Factorial(int i) {
00403     int k,j;
00404     k = 1;
00405     for (j=1; j<i; j++) { k = k*(j+1); }
00406     return k;
00407 }
00408
